Function reference

Read ISA-Tab files

readISATab()
Read an ISA-Tab dataset into an R object.
validISAObject()
Check the validity of an object of class ISA.
initialize(<ISA>)
S4 Class ISA, initialization method

Get and set path

Get and set iFileName

Write ISA-Tab files

writeISAtab() writeInvestigationFile() writeStudyFiles() writeAssayFiles()
Write ISA-Tab object.

Process assay data

getAssayTabs()
Retrieve Assay Tables from an ISA object.
assayTab-class assayTab msAssayTab-class msAssayTab microarrayAssayTab-class microarrayAssayTab
S4 Class assayTab, initialization methods
processAssay()
Process assay tab data

Convenience functions

getStudyFileNames()
Retrieve the Study Identifier(s) and Study File Name(s) from an ISA object.
getAssayFileNames()
Retrieve the Assay File Name(s) per Study from an ISA object.
